name: Javinfo API
description: Backend for Javinfo CLI, a tool to fetch JAV data from various sites

API_USER.description: USERNAME for access to protected endpoints

CAPTCHA_SOLVER_URL.description: An API to solve JAVDB captchas during login

JAVDB_EMAIL.description: Requried for auto-login into JAVDB, usable if only CAPTCHA_SOLVER_URL is set

JAVDB_PASSWORD.description: Requried for auto-login into JAVDB, usable if only CAPTCHA_SOLVER_URL is set

REMEMBER_ME_TOKEN.description: If not using auto-login for JAVDB, manually paste cookies

JDB_SESSION.description: If not using auto-login for JAVDB, manually paste cookies

LOG_REQUEST.description: Log every request made to this API instance

CREATE_REDIS.description: Whether to use an inbuilt redis server [Not a good idea to create one in Heroku]
